name: Pumpkin Smoothie
instruction:
● Whole milk to the middle line
●   6 pumps of Pumpkin Spice sauce
●   Add 1 scoop of protein powder
●   Ice, whole banana and blend!

name: Berry Vanilla Smoothie
instruction:
● Coconut milk to the second line
●   Add crème base
●   Add 2 scoops of berries
●   3 scoops of vanilla bean powder
●   1 banana
●   Tall scoop of ice and blend

name: Berry Forest Smoothie
instruction:
● Strawberry Smoothie
●   Made with passion tea instead of milk
●   Add 2 pumps of Raspberry Syrup
●   Add berries (2 scoops, 3 if you like it extra fruity)

name: Cinnamon Dolce Smoothie
instruction:
● Order a  Chocolate Smoothie
●   Ask for Cinnamon Dolce Syrup instead of Mocha
●   Add 3 scoops of Vanilla Bean

name: Very Berry-licious Smoothie
instruction:
● Fill first line with milk
●   Splash of strawberry juice
●   3 scoops of berries
●   5 slices of orange
●   Whole banana
●   Top with whipped cream
